name: Simple User Import Export
author: Ivan Å valjek

sections.description:
Import and export WordPress and WooCommerce users with ease. Supports user meta fields. Compatible with Shopify exports.

Major features in Simple User Import Export include:

  • WordPress user import and export
  • WooCommerce customer import and export
  • Shopify export tested
  • Import file preview
  • Save current import/export settings to continue next time
  • Drag & drop support
  • User Meta import and export support
  • Templated import fields (compose an import field from multiple csv fields and custom text)
  • Importing passwords with clear text or hash
  • AJAX import with selectable batch size
  • Responsive UI (mobile friendly)
sections.installation: Upload the Simple User Import Export plugin to your blog, activate it, and you are ready to import and export users.

  • Small fixes

  • Protect download URL

1.1.1

  • Fix for user count on WordFence protected site

1.1.0

  • Support for user export
  • Fixed sticky mappings for user meta, now removed when the meta fields are unchecked

1.0.12

  • Support for multiple settings templates

1.0.11

  • Warn before sending data over http
  • Allow updating by user_id
  • Cosmetic changes

1.0.10

  • Added drag & drop support for import file
  • Added import sessions to allow continuation of the import process

1.0.9

  • Added preview table to the first screen
  • Added per user user_role field mapping

1.0.8

  • Template builder for field value

1.0.7

  • Security enhancements

1.0.6

  • Fix crash on store reset (on file reselection)

1.0.5

  • Store is now reset to defaults on new file selection.
  • Parser now skips empty lines in import file.

1.0.0
